page.title: 19UFFCULME REMEMBERED
page.content: There was a railway in Uffculme until ten years ago. When I was a boy I used to like to go down to the station to watch the people getting on and off the train. As a very special treat we would sometimes go on the train to go shopping. You would would go to Tiverton Junction where you caught another train to Exeter, Tiverton or Taunton. They were all steam trains then of course and much more interesting than today's. The other thing we used to love to do was to go swimming in the river and bird's nesting. School was much different then as well. We only learn't a few subjects but we had to learn them well. If we messed about or blotted our books we would get smacked across the wrist with a ruler. I think it made you respect your teacher more. Life was harder but we enjoyed it.
